title: AIDS
creator_credit: Walt Disney Educational Media Company and Joanne Parrent
brief_description: A broad approach that deals with the nature of AIDS, the means of infection, symptoms, prevention, advice and personal responsibilities in relationships. The comprehensive information involves no sexually explicit material and as such is particularly suitable as an introduction to the topic.
